sentences.en: A petroglyph emerges from the Sahara Desert.
sentences.cn: 这是撒哈拉大沙漠里的一块岩石画。

sentences.en: Countries in the sub - Sahara belt will eventually be deprived of their tropical agriculture production.
sentences.cn: 亚撤哈拉地区将最终无法生产热带农产品.

sentences.en: He went across the Sahara on a camel.
sentences.cn: 他骑骆驼穿过撒哈拉大沙漠.

sentences.en: Her latest flight of fancy is to go camping in the Sahara desert!
sentences.cn: 她最近心血来潮想到撒哈拉沙漠去野营!

sentences.en: If you were in the Sahara, you would realise the value of fresh water.
sentences.cn: 如果你在撒哈拉大沙漠, 你就会知道淡水的价值了.

sentences.en: The couple set off in August from Morocco, drove through the Sahara, visited Nigeria and were heading for Zimbabwe.
sentences.cn: 那对夫妇8月从摩洛哥出发，驱车穿过撒哈拉大沙漠，游览了尼日利亚，正向津巴布韦进发。

sentences.en: The name Sahara conjures up images of a desert of aridity.
sentences.cn: "撒哈拉"这个名字使人想起干旱的沙漠情景.

sentences.en: The Sahara Desert is a natural barrier between North and Central Africa.
sentences.cn: 撒哈拉沙漠是北非与中非之间的天然屏障.

sentences.en: The Sahara desert, for example, creeps southward at a rate of thirty miles annually.
sentences.cn: 例如, 撒哈拉沙漠以每年30英里的速度向南方推移.

sentences.en: The Sahara is a vast expanse of desert.
sentences.cn: 撒哈拉是一片广袤无垠的沙漠.

sentences.en: The Sahara is the biggest desert in the world.
sentences.cn: 撒哈拉是世界上最大的沙漠.

sentences.en: The Sahara is the largest desert in the world.
sentences.cn: 撒哈拉大沙漠是世界上最大的沙漠.

sentences.en: The winds that cross the Sahara are dry.
sentences.cn: 掠过撒哈拉大沙漠的大风是干燥的.

sentences.en: There's plenty land , Sahara's drugged with it. "
sentences.cn: 要光是贪图地盘的话, 上撒哈拉大沙漠呀. ”

trans.tran_cn: 撒哈拉沙漠（非洲北部大沙漠），荒野
